title: I cant stand this lag!
body:
Every single year during worlds my ping goes to shit! Is there any way to make it so normal people can actually play or is worlds all that matters? I am running 500MB bandwidth i should not be lagging at all. 

If I cant play during worlds then im just not going to play at all and want a refund on all RP spent. I am not going to pay for a game that I cant play because all you fucking care about is the bull shit worlds tournament. This is a game not a sport. Stop treating it like its an actual sport!

replies.body: Worlds is not on the same platform, so it shouldn't impact your games.  Your network might be unstable and possibly suffering from packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of what's actually happening, and let me know your results.

can you stop blaming our systems and treating us like dumb people? like we don't know to check for packet loss or ping. why don't you instead try to think other ways  worlds could impact the servers we are playing? i noticed you use the word "shouldn't" can you make sure before posting an official answer?

calling bs on that. gues what einstein .. it does affect and if you took the time you would know. if you could even think straight you would see why there are more requirements during that circus you call e sports. seriously lay of the coke.
Damn man, this community is so cancer.
